td.content: s:pt presents with Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has history of moderate cloudiness in eyes. he is a m retired aged 75 Ys. denies any smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 188 cm, Weight 84.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
